name: Never Ending Room
description:
Trapped in a haunted room. You must measure your steps to reach the glass, paying attention to the dangers in each movement.

Obtaining it is the only way out of this paranoid maze ... or is there no way out

Use the mouse to select the squares you want to move to.

You have limited steps to reach the goal. The difficulty will increase with each victory.

Think your movements well or you will have to start from the beginning!

Another obstacle, consisted of enemies. You could choose to defeat them to get more steps.

In addition, collecting items, provided more probability of winning against enemies on the road.

There should be enemys and collectables

Also we had in mind to have a max steps so you need to take fights in order to gain more steps for the harder leves.

 We are sorry we had no time, this is our first Game Jam and our first game.

We are 2 people that makes games for fun

Credits. Jorge Sánchez & Juan A. Varela

Gamcop Team
